#summary &iuml character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesI

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &iuml

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Iuml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00cf/index.htm U+000CF].
  * `&Iuml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00cf/index.htm U+000CF].
  * `&iuml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ef/index.htm U+000EF].
  * `&iuml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ef/index.htm U+000EF].
